issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Capture container start/finish time in container metrics

comments.body:
Uploaded a patch which adds start/finish time, exit code into container metrics.
It is done outside of ContainerMonitor, because I think these kind of metrics need not to be dependent on whether resource-calculator plugin or vmem/pmem flag is enabled or not.

[~vvasudev], thanks for your review !
I think the duration metrics may be derived from finish-start time by the consumer.
Fixed the typo.
